VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.label: kinecticist
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.description: Kinetic psycasts are focused on transforming psychic power into raw kinetic energy to attack enemies.
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.tooltip: Kineticists are adept at killing or maiming foes from a distance. They can shoot bolts of raw energy that have a chance to be homing, suffocate enemies from afar or make a creature's brain explode.
